name: A black maul called Demon's fist (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (awesome in general).
It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom a good amount.
It decreases the users intelligence a good amount.
It decreases the users armour class pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases damage like a god.
